title: Malignant neoplasm: Overlapping lesion of respiratory and intrathoracic organs
block: Malignant neoplasms of respiratory and intrathoracic organs
category: Malignant neoplasm of other and ill-defined sites in the respiratory system and intrathoracic organs
inclusion: Malignant neoplasm of respiratory and intrathoracic organs whose point of origin cannot be classified to any one of the categories C30-C39.0
